title: Phase 3: Test environment
description:
Implement per-worktree test environments:
- Port offset allocation and tracking
- test_env.setup on wt new
- test_env.teardown on wt close/kill
- Health check waiting
- PORT_OFFSET environment variable

title: Phase 2: Project management
description:
Implement project registration and config:
- wt projects: List registered projects
- wt project add <name> <path>: Register project
- wt project config <name>: Edit config
- Per-project merge_mode
- Per-project test_env config
- Project config file structure

title: Phase 4: Merge workflow
description:
Implement merge modes:
- wt done command
- direct mode: merge to main, push
- pr-auto mode: create PR, enable auto-merge
- pr-review mode: create PR, wait for review
- wt status in worker session
- wt abandon command

title: Testing infrastructure
description:
Set up testing infrastructure:
- Unit test framework (go test)
- Integration test harness
- Mock tmux sessions for unit tests
- Temporary worktree directories
- Test fixtures for beads
- CI pipeline (GitHub Actions)
- Test coverage reporting
close_reason: Testing infrastructure complete: unit tests, integration tests, CI pipeline, coverage reporting

title: Phase 5: Monitoring
description:
Implement session monitoring:
- wt watch: Live dashboard with refresh
- Idle detection from tmux pane output
- Desktop notifications (macOS/Linux)
- PR status in dashboard
- Status indicators (working/idle/error)

title: Integration tests
description:
End-to-end integration tests:
- Full workflow: new -> work -> done -> close
- Multi-session scenarios
- Project registration and switching
- Test environment lifecycle (docker compose)
- Merge mode flows (direct, pr-auto, pr-review)
- Seance functionality
- Error recovery scenarios
- Cleanup verification

Use real tmux, real git worktrees, real beads (in temp dirs).

title: Phase 1: Core commands (list, new, switch, kill, close)
description:
Implement core wt commands:
- wt / wt list: List all active sessions
- wt new <bead>: Spawn worker with namepool
- wt <name>: Switch to session
- wt kill <name>: Terminate session
- wt close <name>: Complete + cleanup
- Session state tracking (sessions.json)
- Namepool management
- BEADS_DIR per session

title: Claude skill: /wt
description:
Create Claude Code skill for wt:
- Skill file at ~/.claude/skills/wt.md
- Hub commands (list, new, switch, watch, close)
- Worker commands (status, done, close)
- Seance commands
- Workflow examples
- Install as part of wt install command

title: Phase 7: Polish
description:
Final polish:
- Tmux keybindings (C-b n/p/h)
- Claude skill (/wt)
- Shell completions (bash/zsh/fish)
- Error handling and edge cases
- Documentation and examples
- go install support

title: Phase 6: Seance
description:
Implement seance (talk to past sessions):
- Event logging (session_start, session_end with IDs)
- wt seance: List recent sessions
- wt seance <name>: Fork and talk to past session
- wt seance <name> -p 'question': One-shot query
- Session ID capture from Claude output
- events.jsonl persistence
